00002 #ifndef _MESSAGE_H_
00003 #define _MESSAGE_H_
00004 
00005 //Conditions  of a message it can reach while its life time
00006 enum MESSAGESTATE
00007 {
00008     MSGSTATE_FREE,           //message is not used
00009     MSGSTATE_WAITING,        //message is ready to send
00010     MSGSTATE_SENDING,        //message is marked for sending
00011     MSGSTATE_WAIT_ACK,       //message waits for an acknowledge
00012     MSGSTATE_COMPLETE,       //transmition completed
00013     MSGSTATE_RECEIVECOMPLETE //message completly received
00014 };
00015 
00016 //The possible acknowledge frames
00017 enum EIBACKS
00018 {
00019     EIBNUL = 0b00000000,
00020     EIBACK = 0b11001100,
00021     EIBNAK = 0b00001100,
00022     EIBBSY = 0b11000000,
00023     EIBNAKBSY = EIBNUL
00024 };
00025 
00026 //The type of the frame
00027 enum FRAMETYPE
00028 {
00029     L_DATA,
00030     L_POLL_DATA,
00031     ACKNOWLEDGE,
00032     UNKNOWN
00033 };
00034 
00035 //available priorities
00036 enum EIBPRIORITY
00037 {
00038     SYSTEM = 0b00,
00039     URGENT = 0b10,
00040     NORMAL = 0b01,
00041     LOW    = 0b11
00042 };

00049 class CMessage
00050 {
00051     public:
00052         CMessage ();
00054         void SetOctet (uint8_t pos, uint16_t frame);
00056         uint16_t GetOctet (uint8_t pos);
00057 
00058         CMessage* Next; 
00059         uint8_t Len; 
00060         MESSAGESTATE State; 
00061         void Dump (uint8_t bExtended); 
00062         FRAMETYPE GetFrameType (); 
00063         uint8_t CalcChecksum (void); 
00064         uint8_t GetChecksum (void); 
00065         uint8_t IsACK (void); 
00066         uint8_t IsNAK (void); 
00067         uint8_t IsBusy (void); 
00068 
00069         union
00070         {
00071             uint8_t Byte[23];
00072             //uint8_t Control;
00073             struct
00074             {
00075                 union
00076                 {
00077                     uint8_t Ctrl;
00078                     struct
00079                     {
00080                         unsigned MustZero_1:2;
00081                         unsigned Priority:2;
00082                         unsigned MustOne_1:1;
00083                         unsigned RepeatFlag:1;
00084                         unsigned MustZero_2:1;
00085                         unsigned FrameType: 1;
00086                     } __attribute__ ((packed));
00087                 };
00088 
00089                 union
00090                 {
00091                     uint16_t Value;
00092                     struct
00093                     {
00094                         unsigned Line:4;
00095                         unsigned Range:4;
00096                         uint8_t Subscriber;
00097                     } __attribute__ ((packed));
00098                 } Source;
00099             
00100                 union
00101                 {
00102                     uint16_t Value;
00103                     struct
00104                     {   //Only valid when the DAF is not set
00105                         unsigned Line:4;
00106                         unsigned Range:4;
00107                         unsigned Subscriber:8;
00108                     } __attribute__ ((packed));
00109                     struct
00110                     {   //Only valid when the DAF is set    
00111                         unsigned Middlegroup:3;
00112                         unsigned Maingroup:4;
00113                         uint8_t Subgroup;   
00114                     } __attribute__ ((packed));
00115 
00116                 } Destination;
00117 
00118                 union
00119                 {
00120                     uint8_t DRL;
00121                     struct
00122                     {
00123                         unsigned Length:4;  //length (0 to 15; begins with octet 7)
00124                         unsigned NCF:3;     //Network Control Field (Routing-counter)
00125                         unsigned DAF:1;     //Destination-address-flag; 0: physical address; 1: group address
00126                     } __attribute__ ((packed));
00127                 };
00128                 uint8_t Data[17];
00129             } L_Data;
00130         } __attribute__ ((packed)); 
00131 
00132 
00133     private:
00134         void _init (void);
00135         static uint16_t ui16Count;
00136 };
